2fa-accept-not-found: There are no confirmations to accept!
2fa-accept-success: {PLURAL:n|{n} confirmation was|{n} confirmations were} accepted for {bot}!
2fa-delete-warning: This action cannot be undone. ASF 2FA for the bot {name} will permanently be deleted.
2fa-not-found: This bot doesn't have ASF 2FA enabled! Learn more about it here.
2fa-reject-not-found: There are no confirmations to reject!
2fa-reject-success: {PLURAL:n|{n} confirmation was|{n} confirmations were} rejected for {bot}!
bgr-background-queue: There {PLURAL:n|is {n} game|are {n} games} remaining in the background queue.
bgr-check: Do you want to add the following {PLURAL:n|key|{n} keys} to BGR?
bgr-keys-insert-example:
Example:
AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCC0
AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCC1

You can tag the keys with game names:
AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCC2	Turbo Pug
AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCC3	Bad Rats
bgr-reset: Do you want to reset your key files?
bgr-summary-success: The following {PLURAL:n|key was|{n} keys were} successfully added to BGR
bot-create-name: You have to enter a name
bot-create-name-asf: You can't name your bot ASF
bot-delete-warning: This action cannot be undone. The bot {name} will permanently be deleted together with all it's files.
bot-fav-buttons-description: Choose a button you want to be displayed on bot card for easy and quick action.
bot-game-name-description: Only show game names (hide game banner).
bot-nicknames-description: Display Steam nicknames (if available) instead of bot names.
bot-order-disabled-description: This will order disabled bots last on the Bots page and in Mass Editor.
bot-order-numeric-description: This will arrange your bots numerically instead of alphabetically on the Bots page and in Mass Editor.
commands-send: Click here to send your command
commands-default:
For a list of available commands type: commands
For a short description of a command type: help <command>
config-no-changes: You did not make any changes!
default-page-description: Decide which page ASF-ui should open by default.
description-not-found: No description found for this config property.
display-categories-description: Decide if you want config properties to be categorized.
encrypt-success: Password successfully encrypted, remember to save your config.
hash-success: Hash successfully generated, remember to save your config.
input-info-login: You have not set a login name for this account.
input-info-password: You have not set a password for this account.
input-info-steamguard: This account is currently using Steam Guard.
input-info-steamparentalcode: This account is currently using Steam Family View.
input-info-twofactorauthentication: This account is currently using a Steam authenticator app.
input-no-code-login: You have to enter a Steam login name
input-no-code-password: You have to enter a Steam password
input-no-code-steamguard: You have to enter a Steam Guard code
input-no-code-steamparentalcode: You have to enter a Steam Parental code
input-no-code-twofactorauthentication: You have to enter a 2FA code
language-translation-bad: Only {percent}% of selected language is translated!
language-translation-good: Selected locale, {locale}, is almost fully translated at {percent}%!
log-information-description: Select which logging information you want to be shown
log-previous-amount-description: The amount of previous lines to fetch from log.txt file each time you click
log-timestamp-description: Select how the timestamp should be formatted
log-timestamp-time-date-locale: Display date and time in your locale format
log-timestamp-time-only-locale: Display time in your locale format
mass-editor-bots: Select bots you want to edit config properties for
mass-editor-bots-disabled: Select at least one bot to continue
mass-editor-check-not-saved: Config {PLURAL:n|property is|properties are} already of the same {PLURAL:n|value|values} for selected {PLURAL:m|bot|bots}!
mass-editor-check-saved: {PLURAL:n|Config|Configs} for selected {PLURAL:n|bot has|bots have} been saved!
mass-editor-check-values: The following config {PLURAL:n|property|properties} will be saved:
mass-editor-create-bot: Do you want to create a new bot?
mass-editor-properties: Select config properties you want to edit
mass-editor-properties-disabled: Select at least one config property to continue
mass-editor-search-not-found: No config property found, consider changing the search query
name-description: string type with no default value. This property is required and defines bot name - it's used for identification purpose inside ASF only. Must be unique for each bot.
notification-position-description: Decide where you want notifications to be displayed.
notify-release-description: Notify me when a new release is available (depending on config property UpdateChannel in ASF Config).
releases-changelog: There is currently no changelog available for this release.
setup-gateway-timeout: Gateway timeout. Trying to reconnect in {PLURAL:n|{n} second|{n} seconds}...
setup-network-error: Lost connection to ASF. Trying to reconnect in {PLURAL:n|{n} second|{n} seconds}...
setup-no-ipc-password: You forgot to set IPCPassword in ASF config. Read more about it here.
setup-not-connected: Unable to connect to ASF IPC server. Make sure ASF is running!
setup-rate-limited: You have been rate limited due to too many failed tries. Please try again in an hour.
sidebar-info: Found a bug or want to suggest an idea to improve ASF-ui?
tag-placeholder: Press enter to save Steam ID
terminal-available-commands:
Available ASF commands: {commands}

Available ASF-ui commands: {uiCommands}
terminal-help-text: Usage: help <Command>, for a list of available commands type: commands
terminal-no-help: There's no help text for {command} yet!
tooltip-delay-description: Select how fast you want tooltips to be shown.
update-is-newest: Local version is ahead of selected update channel
update-trying: New release available! Trying to update...
welcome-message: Welcome to ASF-ui, the official web interface for ASF.
welcome-message-todo: The following things should be done:
